backend/main.mo: Defines comparison functions and data types for user profiles, recommendations, job listings, feedback, payments, and campaigns within a Motoko actor.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report mapping admin panel Stripe and operational status features to affected frontend files and components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries describing the purpose of each frontend file such as components, hooks, styles, and configuration.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind-based styling with CSS variables for light/dark themes and base UI styles.
frontend/index.html: Main HTML template with enhanced SEO metadata, social sharing tags, preload directives, and performance hints.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React app handling authentication, routing, lazy-loaded sections, error boundaries, and global providers including Theme and React Query.
frontend/src/components/AdminDashboard.t: Admin dashboard UI that checks admin status and shows tabs for campaigns, Stripe config, and other settings.
frontend/src/components/AdminOperational: Visual indicator component showing operational status with an animated globe.
frontend/src/components/AdminStripeConfi: Admin interface for configuring and verifying Stripe and Twilio credentials, notifications, and operational status.
Full campaign management UI for creating, editing, previewing, duplicating, and analyzing marketing campaigns.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Simple footer displaying copyright and a link to caffeine.ai.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Top navigation bar handling authentication, step navigation, and optional admin access.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Landing page hero section with animations, CTAs, analytics tracking, and waitlist modal support.
frontend/src/components/InterviewSection: Interactive interview flow that collects user profile data, generates career recommendations, and saves results using backend queries.
frontend/src/components/JobListingsSecti: Fetches live job listings, filters by user input, and generates skill‑gap analyses based on the user's saved profile.
frontend/src/components/MarketingDashboa: Dashboard for configuring marketing platforms, viewing campaign metrics, and validating analytics integrations.
frontend/src/components/PaymentCancelPag: Displays payment‑cancellation info, triggers analytics events, and offers retry or home navigation options.
frontend/src/components/PaymentSuccessPa: Handles successful payment flow, fires multi‑platform conversion events, and shows confirmation UI with navigation.
frontend/src/components/PricingSection.t: Renders pricing plans and handles checkout with analytics tracking and redirects to Stripe.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupModa: Displays a modal to collect a user's name and saves an initial empty profile before closing.
frontend/src/components/RecommendationsS: Fetches and displays career recommendations with images, details, and job exploration actions.
frontend/src/components/SkillFusionSecti: Shows sample blended-skill career paths using stylized cards and background imagery.
frontend/src/components/WaitlistModal.ts: Collects name and email for a waitlist signup, stores it locally, and triggers analytics events.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's identity and refreshes dependent queries on change.
frontend/src/hooks/useAnalytics.ts: React hook for extracting and storing UTM params and integrating with various analytics platforms.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides React context and hooks for managing Internet Identity authentication via AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Collection of React Query hooks wrapping backend actor calls for user profiles, careers, jobs, campaigns, and related data.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS base styles, theming variables, dark mode settings, animations, and accessibility adjustments.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with InternetIdentityProvider and React Query client.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility functions for reading, persisting, and clearing URL and session parameters.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration extending themes, colors, screens, animations, and plugins.
project_state.json: Defines the project state, known Stripe-mode issues, and existing feature specs for status indicators, operational status, a globe icon, and auto-refresh behavior, plus partial new feature requests.
